website_summaries.verdict: While is has a comfortable contoured fit, it also has some flaws.
pros: Made of memory foam for a comfortable fit and complete light blockage
Features an adjustable strap and bonus ear plugs
cons: Larger consumers might find the fit to be somewhat snug

customer_reviews.title: IF YOU WANT A GOOD NIGHTS SLEEP WITH NO INTERRUPTIONS GET THESE
customer_reviews.text: I can finally sleep soundly, took a little while to adjust to it, but now I don't even want to get up, keeps the light out for me and if I have to open my eyes for some reason, it is padded just right to where it is not laying straight on my eyelids like some sleep masks I've had
customer_reviews.author: Geri

customer_reviews.title: EXTREMELY comfortable! I have never been the type to do ...
customer_reviews.text: EXTREMELY comfortable! I have never been the type to do the whole "mask thing", but I am going to be backpacking around Spain and staying in hostels, so I think this will help with the whole "feeling-like-someone-is-watching-me-sleep" issue. But, I digress: they don't compress your eyes, they are soft, they don't shift, and black out EVERYTHING. I'm satisfied with my purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Miah

customer_reviews.title: Love This!!!
customer_reviews.text: My bedroom gets a lot of lot even with shades and the curtains closed so I needed something to keep me from waking up to early. It's confortable to wear and really blocks out the light.
customer_reviews.author: LITTLEONEINCT

customer_reviews.title: I love this mask
customer_reviews.text: I love this mask! It fits perfectly, and does not press on my eyes. I love that the head strap is adjustable and the material is soft. My only (small) complaint is that the ear plugs don't fit well, and don't form to my ears well, allowing noise. They do help, but could be softer. I could not manage having a migraine without this! Definitely recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: BEWARE: STAINS PILLOWCASES
customer_reviews.text: I had no complaints until I found blue-black stains all over my husband's pillowcase. It took me a few nights to figure out what it was, and once I figured out it was cheap, improperly set fabric dye, I was able to get it out. If I hadn't noticed in time to use the correct chemical intervention before drying (heat sets stains), this cheap mask would have ruined an expensive sheet set with plenty of life left in it. Not happy about this purchase and wish I had realized in time to get a refund, but again, I'd rather lose the mask money and still have the sheets.
customer_reviews.author: Hermione G.

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Item arrived very quickly and in good condition. First impression...very comfortable and soft mask. The mask fits my face perfectly and I didn't see any light which was nice. The earplugs were okay. Not really that strong. I bought better ones in a package at CVS. I would have liked to have a little sewn-in pocket to place the earplugs in, but the tiny plastic case was still nice. I'd buy this mask again and I would recommend it because it's comfortable on the head and doesn't push into your eyes very much at all.
customer_reviews.author: T. Scranton

customer_reviews.title: Have a college student? This one is perfect. Satisfied customer.
customer_reviews.text: Totally adjustable eye-wear for night. Very comfortable and appreciated. Comes with earplugs and this would make a great set for just about anyone. I have a bigger head and it adjusted for me. You don't even have to adjust it if your head is medium sized. Yes, you can make it smaller, also. Very nice quality. Thanks! Great Service and quality products. Nice earplugs. I ended up getting two sets of these. Comfortable. Works great when you need it.
customer_reviews.author: Carla

customer_reviews.title: Perfect sleep mask look no further
customer_reviews.text: I’ve bought very many sleep masks and they all have figment issues.. this one is problem free! I would recommend this to anyone looking for a comfortable and dark sleep mask. I use this when traveling and at home. Really great price you can afford to keep one anywhere you need it! I keep one in my office, car, workout bag, purse, kitchen drawer, coat closet, pantry, basement, laundry room, den, bathroom, friends cars glovebox, nightstand, toolbox, fridge, garage, pool house, underwear drawer, in-laws guest room, backpack, fanny pack, duffle bag, suitcase, broom closet pretty much anywhere you might want to take a nap!
customer_reviews.author: Kyle J Mayberry

customer_reviews.title: ... for my husband after mine helped me fall asleep better. We don't use the ear plugs much
customer_reviews.text: Got a second set for my husband after mine helped me fall asleep better. We don't use the ear plugs much, but they work alright when I do. It always slips off at night and I have to find it in the morning. I tried tightening the velcro, but it stretched and still slips off. It's okay, though, because I just need it to fall asleep, not stay asleep.
customer_reviews.author: likethebug

customer_reviews.title: Would buy to give everyone who needs to sleep during the day
customer_reviews.text: Omg..omg.omg perfect perfect fit to my face i can not see a sred of light with my eyes looking for it hahah Btw .. its afternoon when i tried it
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: so it takes a bit of arranging and rearranging to get the sleep mask on and fitting good enough to block out the light
customer_reviews.text: Haven't tried the earplugs. The sleep mask is nothing special, but it works. I have a CPAP machine, so it takes a bit of arranging and rearranging to get the sleep mask on and fitting good enough to block out the light, a bit of a hassle, but it works.
customer_reviews.author: J. Berks

customer_reviews.title: Lights Out!
customer_reviews.text: This works perfectly for me! I work the night shift so when I come home it's very bright outside! I just don't use the ear plugs. They aren't for me. Also, the strap is adjustable for your head size
customer_reviews.author: B3autyfullif3

customer_reviews.title: Great sleep aid
customer_reviews.text: Helps me sleep! Pitch black raises our own melatonin levels naturally and as I focus my mind outward on the sound of the fan, the next thing I know, I am awakening (for my midnight trip) and I fall back asleep easily till morning.
customer_reviews.author: Joe Consumer

customer_reviews.title: I loved it at first because it was comfortable and I ...
customer_reviews.text: I loved it at first because it was comfortable and I kinda looked like Spiderman with It on. The eye piece is lifted from the eye area so you don't get weird imprint marks around your eyes like with most masks. However when I washed it in the washing machine it came apart a little. Overall still like it and it has a cool foam like material so probably need to wash by hand.
customer_reviews.author: Sara Kerrigan

customer_reviews.title: BEST ONES!
customer_reviews.text: BEST ONES!!! I have purchased many.. and have bought this one several times - one for each kid, and each suitcase... love these !!! contour WORKS (unlike others) plus the nose cut out actually allows it to fit snug against you thereby blocking all light.. GREAT PRODUCT !!! which it came in fun colors :)
customer_reviews.author: Leah C Fitzgerald

customer_reviews.title: I really like how the straps are adjustable and the mask is ...
customer_reviews.text: I received my package yesterday and couldn't wait to use it at bedtime. I really like how the straps are adjustable and the mask is very confortable. I was a little disappointed with the ear plugs because they didn't block out noise as much as I thought they would. I've bought ear plugs from physical stores that worked better. Besides that, I slept like a baby with the mask and I'm very pleased and satisfied with it.
customer_reviews.author: Vontresa

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: It will work but it's not worth $10. It's cheaply made and smells funny. Feels like it will still be comfortable but not "luxury". Also didn't come with ear plugs.
customer_reviews.author: Molly

customer_reviews.title: Horrible product DON'T BUY!!!
customer_reviews.text: This was great for the first couple months then I noticed it started leaving black patches all over my white pillow. It also started peeling. This is great if you want a mask for only a couple months and then have to toss it and get a new one.
customer_reviews.author: Megan Walls

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I like the softness the fact that it was very comfortable against my eyes as I recently had eye surgery also blocked out the light this is hands down the best mask I've ever purchased.I will purchase another soon just to have as a backup
customer_reviews.author: vicki jean garey

customer_reviews.title: Recommended
customer_reviews.text: Works well, but takes a bit of getting used to wearing.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry L Bouwens

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable around the eyes. Adjustable strap is really nice
customer_reviews.text: Great for traveling. Fits nicely on face and leaves a little room for your eyes. I've ordered a few of these when I've lost or left them places.
customer_reviews.author: Jacob Hicks

customer_reviews.title: Good mask
customer_reviews.text: Mask is great for keeping me from seeing when I get poked for blood draws. Earplugs did not stay in
customer_reviews.author: LdyLune

customer_reviews.title: Pleasantly surprised. The eye part is curved just enough ...
customer_reviews.text: Pleasantly surprised. The eye part is curved just enough to give you room to open your eyes. No pressure on your eyes.
customer_reviews.author: AG

customer_reviews.title: Used product, ineligible for return. Buyers beware!
customer_reviews.text: Product came used and crusty. Pretty gross. Ineligible for return.
customer_reviews.author: Jacqueline

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice
customer_reviews.text: I am happy with this purchase. This product is great. Thanks.
customer_reviews.author: Stan

customer_reviews.title: Was almost perfect.
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable and blocks nearly all light but the black dye comes off on your pillow cases after a couple weeks of use, going to try washing it a few times to see if that helps.
customer_reviews.author: Adama

customer_reviews.title: could have been better!
customer_reviews.text: Would have given a better rating but it stained two pillow cases and one pillow. It did good job on blocking the light.
customer_reviews.author: bensview

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love the sleep mask. It is light weight and comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Tanana

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is the greatest eye mask ever, so comfortable and blocks all light.
customer_reviews.author: Yvette Roberge

customer_reviews.title: So comfortable and for someone like me who cannot sleep helps ...
customer_reviews.text: So comfortable and for someone like me who cannot sleep helps keep light distractions out. Very happy with item.
customer_reviews.author: Terri M. Crispino

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Mask falls apart after regular usage. There's no stitching, it's just cloth glued to foam.
customer_reviews.author: khaz

customer_reviews.title: Not a huge problem but it can be midly annoying.
customer_reviews.text: After some time and with daily use the mask tends to loosen and filter in some light. Not a huge problem but it can be midly annoying.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Stain my pillow!
customer_reviews.text: This sleep mask is comfortable and blocks out light well. The reason that I gave it only 2 stars is that it stains my pillow blue. I have white pillow cases so blue stain on them is not very nice. I would have returned these had I not lost track of time.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: blurry vision for long period of time after taking this ...
customer_reviews.text: blurry vision for long period of time after taking this off. Has never happened with any other sleeping mask I've used.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good, use it every night
customer_reviews.text: I like it The fabric is good, ergonomic shape no light comes inside. Definitely recommend, I have not tried ear bean yet thought
customer_reviews.author: Alise

customer_reviews.title: A+ Mask
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my wife and she loves them. I blocks out all light.
customer_reviews.author: Dieva

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable but disappointed that it began to fall apart within two weeks.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel or Mae Barrett Iverson

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: Good fit and stays on better .blocks light and has an adjustable head strap. Probably buy some extras for travel and at home
customer_reviews.author: wlambeth

customer_reviews.title: Works great and perfect for the price!
customer_reviews.text: Quality product for the price. I find that it's extremely comfortable, it doesn't bother my eyes as it's made so that it doesn't go directly against them and yet it keeps everything 100% dark. I don't find that I have light leakage like some other masks and it stays in place during the night.
customer_reviews.author: Crayon

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love the eye mask, but it did not come with ear plugs.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca McClelland

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Awesome! Comfy and adjustable. Wish it would be a little closer to my eyes but still love it. Thanks for the free earplugs!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Falls Apart and Stains Pillows - Don't Buy!
customer_reviews.text: My GF and I have been using this product for about two months now. We had noticed that our pillows and sheets were getting dark stains but couldn't figure it out until we saw one of the stains were mask shaped. Also the masks have started coming apart only after 2 months so they are not built to last. Spend your money somewhere else.
customer_reviews.author: John M Huang

customer_reviews.title: The elastic part became loose very fast. The shape ...
customer_reviews.text: The elastic part became loose very fast. The shape of the mask seem to weaken and a lot of light gets it from the bottom side.
customer_reviews.author: Arthur Shurley

customer_reviews.title: The Velcro isn't very strong and I didn't like the way it sat on my head
customer_reviews.text: The Velcro isn't very strong and I didn't like the way it sat on my head. Just wasn't comfortable. Threw it away.
customer_reviews.author: Mona

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Not as luxurious as they make it sound. Doesn't completely block out the light.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Pass

customer_reviews.title: Works good but the inside material is starting to come apart ...
customer_reviews.text: Works good but the inside material is starting to come apart from the mask on the side it sits on your eyes. good product but CHEAP quality
customer_reviews.author: matthew freeman

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply made
customer_reviews.text: Ears hurt after taking out ear plugs. The mask started falling apart after about 2 months of use
customer_reviews.author: Hddn

customer_reviews.title: Poorly built
customer_reviews.text: It is already falling apart after only a few months of use. I have had sleep masks for years before they showed this kind of wear. Very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It keeps the light out and I like that.
customer_reviews.text: I use this Sleep Mask every night. It keeps the light out and I like that.
customer_reviews.author: Chief1955

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't measure up to the ad
customer_reviews.text: Arrived promptly from supplier. Has an excellent strap with a wide adjustment range. But the cutout for the nose on my mask is too high, making it impossible to block all light as suggested in the ad. Other sleep masks purchased via Amazon don't have this problem. Reading some of the 5-star reviews for this one, I have to wonder if what I received is the same product.
customer_reviews.author: R. W. Russell

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: It's comfortable but the inside material has started to peel off the foam. It does it's job though.
customer_reviews.author: Angelina Milani

customer_reviews.title: Nice and lumpy
customer_reviews.text: This mask does it's job blocking light and the strap adjustment is great. The 2 star rating is for the seams on the Velcro. The end where the material is tucked in makes a nice little lump to rest my head on. By morning time, I have a sore spot on my head. Not pleasant.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Dye stains pillows
customer_reviews.text: Is comfortable and effective but black dye comes off and stains pillows. Cannot recommend for this reason.
customer_reviews.author: R. Pape

customer_reviews.title: The mask will stain your pillowcases and clothes.
customer_reviews.text: I've never used a sleep mask before, so I was excited to try this one to help me fall asleep at night. The mask fits comfortably and keeps light out. However, the mask stained my pillowcases every single time I used it. One time, I brought the eye mask with me in an overnight bag and the dye from the mask rubbed off on a white shirt that was next to it in the bag, completely ruining the top. It's a great mask except for the fact that it stains everything. :(
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Campbell

customer_reviews.title: i was very disappointed with this
customer_reviews.text: Strap is not adjustable and I don't have a big head! It is not going to work for the long haul. They all tend to stretch so I can see within a few days use it is going to be too big for my head and light will filter in; i was very disappointed with this. I believe it said it was adjustable and if not, it just makes no sense to make a product like this without the ability to adjust it. We all have different size heads!
customer_reviews.author: Dr. G

customer_reviews.title: Poor Quality
customer_reviews.text: I have had this sleep mask for a month. It stained my white pillows blue and the glue holding the fabric around the nose area gave out causing the fabric to separate.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: I can live with the sleep mask, but the ...
customer_reviews.text: I can live with the sleep mask, but the ear plugs are worthless. Nothing I did could get those things to fit and stay in my ear.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Hatton

customer_reviews.title: Winner for Most Comfortable and Effective Mask!
customer_reviews.text: Between all my travel on international flights and buying more comfortable masks, this mask is far and away the most comfortable. Plus, you don't get the indentations in your face from wearing it. Comfortable and blocks out the light!
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Benoist

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable mask, I don't get much light leaks. Also stays off my eyelashes which I like.
customer_reviews.author: janetr

customer_reviews.title: This is Great for keeping ALL light out of your eyes when you need it!
customer_reviews.text: I love this little sleep mask!! It works Excellent!!! I'm very pleased with it. I haven't used the ear plugs, but they come in a nice little sturdy plastic case.
customer_reviews.author: R.D.

customer_reviews.title: GREAT DEAL. GREAT QUALITY.
customer_reviews.text: This sleeping mask is amazing. I sleep well with it. Perfect if you are sensitive to light. The Velcro strap is also amazing. Other sleeping mask use adjustable plastic clips. This just uses a Velcro strip. I would choose this Velcro strip over the plastic clips because it will be more durable. I have bought the plastic clip sleeping mask and they break so easy if you are a heavy sleeper. The Luxury sleeping mask is great for deep sleepers. Blocks out all the light for my sensitive eyes. This product also does not touch your eyes. My eye lashes are not squished. GREAT PRODUCT FOR THE PRICE. this is Really cheap price and high quality item.
customer_reviews.author: subzero_flow

customer_reviews.title: Presses Against My Eyes
customer_reviews.text: I wasn't expecting a sleep mask that feels as though it has plastic molded into it. It presses against my eyes and skin, regardless of how tight/loose the adjustable strap is set. The plus is that it completely darkens the room unless it's set too loose and moves around while you sleep. I've gone back to my soft airline sleep mask intended for a reclining position--at least I don't wake with achy eyes.
customer_reviews.author: Enchanted

customer_reviews.title: I like this mask
customer_reviews.text: This is an unusual, but very effective mask. I call it my Pixie Bra. The material is similar to that used by padded bras, and the eye covers are actually cupped. I like this mask! The ONLY thing that needs to be altered, IMHO is the velcro style adjustment. The "sharp" side of the velcro faces outward. This makes is catch on other material, like the pillow. I simply flip it around to avoid this. I wear this every night and have had no problems with it at all.
customer_reviews.author: JustaGeek

customer_reviews.title: ... sometimes nap during the day and this mask is Comfortable and blocks the light
customer_reviews.text: I sometimes nap during the day and this mask is Comfortable and blocks the light! I've spent $15 for a store bought sleeping mask that was not at all comfortable in the bridge of my nose. This sleeping mask does not put any pressure on the bridge of my nose! That price for a great product!
customer_reviews.author: Tami Pfeffer

customer_reviews.title: So comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: This mask is a real step up from flat fabric. I used it on two 16-hour flights and it was great. Good, comfortable fit. Soft and very lightweight. It didn't move around or get in the way. Better than the free one from the airline by far!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fabric bleeds
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves the comfort of the mask. The fabric bled black on the pillowcase.
customer_reviews.author: Yvonne R. Mcnaughton

customer_reviews.title: ... works well to block out light and is relatively comfortable, but it stained our sheets and pillowcases
customer_reviews.text: It works well to block out light and is relatively comfortable, but it stained our sheets and pillowcases. Maybe I should have washed it beforehand?
customer_reviews.author: Matt F.

customer_reviews.title: One of the Best Purchases on Amazon
customer_reviews.text: This was one of the I made on Amazon, and has helped me sleep many times. Headphones are better than earplugs at drowning out noise.
customer_reviews.author: Zephrin Cochran

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works like a dream. Has a great firm hold that helps with not slipping. It doesn't suffocate the eyes with its dome shape. The Velcro is great and doesn't stick to my hair.
customer_reviews.author: Kris Salt

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great product I purchased another one the moment I wore it that night I'll definitely buy more
customer_reviews.author: roffler Hair Design

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and effective
customer_reviews.text: Great at blocking out the light and comfortable enough to put on at 2 am and sleep through to 10
customer_reviews.author: CMM

customer_reviews.title: seems there should be a better way to keep on
customer_reviews.text: works well; seems there should be a better way to keep on tho
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: Mask is sufficient for $10.00 I didn't receive any ear plugs though which I was banking on for my flight.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffmich

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight and comfortable eye mask.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for me. Lightweight and comfortable. It does blocks light adequately.
customer_reviews.author: Carmen Ortiz

customer_reviews.title: I needed this mask like yesterday.
customer_reviews.text: as dark as it gets, I needed this mask like yesterday.
customer_reviews.author: Ann Fullerton

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: I'm on a business trip with up to 5 people in bunk beds. With this mask and earplugs, I got a good night sleep. I was still able to hear my alarm go off!
customer_reviews.author: George

customer_reviews.title: These are great
customer_reviews.text: Love these. Really comfortable and keep 95% of light out. I can finally sleep in a little
customer_reviews.author: toni magle

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I need total darkness when sleeping, this mask does the trick
customer_reviews.author: E N

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Fits well, if a little too snug, even after loosening the velcro as far as I can.
customer_reviews.author: Michael J Hebert

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The best sleep mask I've ever used; I will be buying more in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Amina

customer_reviews.title: Perfect from hotel stays
customer_reviews.text: Purchased these for hotel room sleepovers and boy did they come in handy. Blocked out 90% of the room light & that 3am drunken neighbor noise was reduced in half. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Ear Plugs Not Included
customer_reviews.text: As stated by another reviewer referencing the dollar store, these are not worth $10. The plastic bag the mask comes in was opened, the mask was floating around the Amazon box (not what you want with something that is going on your face), and the ear plugs were not included in our package. The positive is the Velcro strap for a secure fit. Otherwise, a huge price cut would be appropriate for the lack of quality and missing ear plugs. My daughter needed a sleep eye mask to block light when her college roommate gets up before dawn for work.
customer_reviews.author: Family to the 5 Power

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: love this! they work very well, blocking out all light and fit perfectly snug, not too tight.
customer_reviews.author: TMA

customer_reviews.title: Nice ...light...it works!!!
customer_reviews.text: Love it. My husband has the tv on all night. The sound is off but I cannot sleep with light from tv.
customer_reviews.author: annie

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: Meh. Not suitable for bigger heads. Not fully lightproof. Good velcro stick though. And nice design. Simple and black.
customer_reviews.author: David D.

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: the stitching came out and it fell apart after a couple of weeks.
customer_reviews.author: Ashanti

customer_reviews.title: Comfy
customer_reviews.text: So puffy and comfy. Blocks out the Florida sun perfectly
customer_reviews.author: me

customer_reviews.title: A bandana is better..
customer_reviews.text: Slips off when I move around. I am a Line haul trucker and have to sleep during the day. If I am going to use a mask to block out light it should provide full cover. This is an ok product that works and is reasonably priced. But as I said. it slips. A bandana is better...
customer_reviews.author: John Hann

customer_reviews.title: Not happy
customer_reviews.text: Light still seeps in because it just doesn't fit right. Also, it causes my eyes irritation.
customer_reviews.author: J.E.M

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: Well the earplugs barely work at all, they just fall out. My biggest issue is the blurry vision I get after taking this off. I have adjusted it and it is comfortable enough while on, I sleep deeply but my vision is cloudy and very blurry after wearing.
customer_reviews.author: gelkids78

customer_reviews.title: NOT GREAT
customer_reviews.text: I did not like the sleep mask. I've tried many different sleep masks and this was one of the more uncomfortable ones I've ever used. It did not do a very good job of blocking out light from the bottom. I would not recommend the sleep mask
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work for me, may work for others. ...
customer_reviews.text: Didn't work for me, may work for others. Fit my big head well, however I sleep on my stomach and have high cheekbones and fat cheeks. When lying down my cheeks would push up on the mask a little letting light in. To stop that I would have to tighten the mask which would make it uncomfortable, planning to return.
customer_reviews.author: Napricorn83

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Wore it once and woke up with black ink stains all over my white pillowcase. Wtf
customer_reviews.author: Karen H Griffith

product_meta.title: Luxury Sleep Mask with Ear Plugs | Light Blocking Eye Mask for Sleeping Deeper | Features Memory Foam, Contoured Design, Adjustable Strap & Ear Plugs | Insomnia Aid
product_meta.description:
“Finally! A comfortable sleep mask that helps me get to sleep and stay asleep!” | “I’m not even interested in trying to sleep without this mask EVER again!” | “Stays in place to keep it dark during my entire sleep!”

The Living Pure Luxury Sleep Mask is designed for the deepest possible sleep. The lightweight eye mask features luxury nylon on the outside, and luxurious memory foam eye cavities on the inside. The cavities measure ⅝” deep so as not to smudge makeup during daytime napping, and allow for the eyes to open completely under the mask. For the perfect fit, our mask also features an adjustable velcro strap that allows the mask to expand from 16” to 23” in circumference. Whether you use it for travel, meditation, or daytime napping, our mask allows your body to feel rejuvenated when you wake.

Deep sleep improves your productivity and decision making processes during the day. Since even small amounts of light can disrupt your sleep, the Living Pure mask provides pure darkness to help your body increase the production of melatonin--a natural, sleep inducing hormone. For best results, combine our eye mask with our Living Pure Tranquility essential oil which is a blend of Valerian, Lavender, Italian Bergamot and Frankincense to calm the mind, relax the body, and serve as a powerful sleep aid that will ensure a luxurious and restful night's sleep. Start your day off right by guaranteeing a deep, restful night of sleep!

At Living Pure, our products bridge the gap between ancient Apothecary and Modern Herbalism and Aromatherapy. We offer only the finest relaxation products on the market, and stand behind them.

Don’t settle for another night of restless sleep! Order the Living Pure Luxury Sleep Mask now, and join the thousands of happy and well-rested customers who are sleeping deeper today!
